title: The Magic of Daydreaming
description: Mona is a small, purple, furry creature with a BIG dream. What is her dream? To one day fly high in the sky and enjoy the magnificent view from above. But how will she do it?We invite you to spread your wings by following along on Mona's adventure in discovering how to make your dreams come true.Are you ready for the magic?
author: Kyra Kalweit
